reset.subject: Reset password for $t(common:layout.app_name_compact)
reset.body: Hello! To reset your password, you can click on this link: {{baseUrl}}/password/reset?email={{email}}&hash={{userHash}}

signup.subject: Welcome to $t(common:layout.app_name_compact)
signup.body: Welcome to $t(common:layout.app_name_compact)! Please follow the link and press the button to verify your email: {{baseUrl}}/verify/verify?email={{email}}&hash={{userHash}}

verification.subject: Verify your email address
verification.body: Hello! Please verify your email address by clicking on this link: {{baseUrl}}/verify/verify?email={{email}}&hash={{userHash}}
